Models¶

class bhp_appointment_helper.models.BaseAppointmentHelperModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_sync.classes.base_sync_model.BaseSyncModel

Base for models that may be trigger the creation of appointments such as registration models models that need a key to RegisteredSubject.

Such models may be listed by name in the ScheduledGroup model and thus trigger the creation of appointments.

post_prepare_appointments()¶

Users may override to add functionality after creating appointments.

pre_prepare_appointments()¶

Users may override to add functionality before creating appointments.

prepare_appointments()¶

Creates all appointments linked to this instance.

Calls pre_prepare_appointments() and post_prepare_appointments().

See also

appointment_helper.AppointmentHelper.

save(*args, **kwargs)¶

Calls method to check if appointments need to be prepared (see prepare_appointments()).
